mainContent.heading: What is the Image with Text Scroll Section?
paragraphs: The Image with Text Scroll section allows you to combine a fixed visual with vertically scrolling text to create a premium storytelling experience.
As visitors scroll, the text content moves while the image remains static, helping draw attention to key messages without overwhelming the layout.
This section is ideal for brand storytelling, product highlights, lookbooks, and campaign-focused content where clarity and visual balance matter.
